descriptionHtml:
I'm sorry for the long absence, since I simply became bored with Skyrim - again. I don't know what it is. I look at mods, I get 'em still, check 'em out, then I stop playing. This happened before, and it'll happen again. The female version is in progress, but don't count on it anytime this November.

This mod was originally created because I was messing around in Photoshop, and when I made the body of this armor, it hit me - Make this armor as a mod. So, I did.

The intent was to have this nightingale armor with the skull mask from exium, I haven't got word from him/her yet, so in the meantime, I made one without the skull mask.

As you read, it IS a retexture, not standalone. However, if someone is actually willing to make this standalone, go ahead. I like it being a retexture, but whatever.

Unfortunately, I haven't done the female texture, so it'll be a while. Not only that, but I haven't tested the weight slider yet, although I think it's all good, only thing I need to do is the female retexture.
author: Your Boy
